eggs.name: node.js generic
eggs.description:
a generic node.js egg

This will clone a git repo. it defaults to master if no branch is specified.

Installs the node_modules on install. If you set user_upload then I assume you know what you are doing.
eggs.author: parker@parkervcp.com

eggs.name: Paper
eggs.description: High performance Spigot fork that aims to fix gameplay and mechanics inconsistencies.
eggs.author: parker@pterodactyl.io

eggs.name: Purpur
eggs.description: A drop-in replacement for Paper servers designed for configurability, and new fun and exciting gameplay features.
eggs.author: purpur@birdflop.com
